message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer is in your best interest considering the inflation.
I think 60-40 is a fair split, considering I'll be losing 20% of the value each round.
Bob, it's clear the clock is ticking faster for you. I'm being generous, but this is my final offer.
I'd rather take a bigger share now than lose even more value in the next round. This is my counteroffer.
